name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Music Pack Vol. 2
description:
This is Vol. 2! Get new arrangements of 6 popular Toho songs
accompanied by 6 challenge stages.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Music Pack Vol. 3
description: Special Music Pack, Vol. 3 is a special Music pack including arrangements of the 6 most requested Music, plus 6 challenges to go with each Music!!

name: Dark Hermetic Order
description: A cancelled first person action adventure game planned as a sequel to Azrael's Tear. Players would take the role of a secret agent with magic powers, who infiltrates a strange cult to eliminate their leaders.

name: Sicari 2: The Brink of Time
description:
A complete overhaul of SMW, set in an original universe!
Two main playable characters, Sicari and K-16, each with their own playstyle.
Seven unique bosses.
Tons of unique level themes, complete with entirely original graphics.
Six main worlds, a secret world, and a special world!
46 exits!

name: Dark Hour
description: A commercial add-on for Quake that adds new custom levels.

name: The Little Spirit of the East
description: The Little Spirit of the East is a mystery adventure game set in a legendary village.

name: Non Fingo
description: VR spaceship crew simulator with realistic physics and extensive mod support.

name: Warriors Orochi 3: Ultimate - Definitive Edition
description: With all the content of "Warriors Orochi 3", new characters and episodes that deepen the story, new modes, and DLC that has been released for other platforms, enjoy the world of Orochi to your heart's content!

name: Booty Farm
description: Congrats, you just inherited a farm and your hot neighbors will not let you be! Erotic hijinks ensue on your neverending quest to expand your farm! Discover spicy romances and intertwining stories in this bizarrely relaxing farm simulator.

name: DD No Limit Texas Hold'em Tournament Edition
A Balanced Brew
description: A Balanced Brew is a challenging but charming tale of one person's unicycle-mounted quest for a good coffee, across improbably treacherous terrain.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Music Pack Vol. 4
description: "Special Music Pack Vol. 4" is a collection of arranged music selected by the development team that is fun to play with Spell Bubble!

name: Greed
description: A dice game for two to four players.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a boxing game that was inspired by the first five Rocky movies.

name: DD Tournament Poker No limit Texas Hold 'em
Decisive Battles of WWII: Ardennes Offensive
description:
Decisive Battles of WWII: Ardennes Offensive is a computer wargame developed by the Strategic Studies Group. The game depicts the historic World War II battle known as the Battle of the Bulge.

Ardennes Offensive is the first game in the Decisive Battles of World War II series.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Music Pack Vol. 5
description:
Special Song Arrangement Pack Vol. 5 is here, and it's filled with hits!
Popular songs by Amane-san and beatMario like "Shiawase Usagi" and rhythm game favorite, "Hakanakimono Ningen," as well as the overseas hit, "Tiny Little Adiantum" are all included in this special variety pack!

name: Kirby's Dream Buffet
description: Hungry for some 4-player Kirby fun? Race through delicious obstacle courses, collect the most strawberries, and thwart your competition using familiar abilities.

name: Play Chess: Deep Fritz - Grandmaster Deluxe
Touhou Spell Bubble: Gensokyo Holoism Pack
description:
Gensokyo Holoism Pack includes all the popular "Gensokyo Holoism" arrangements.
The challenges in this release contain special mini-stories!
All the mini stories are Shichijo Lettuce (IOSYS) originals,
based off "Touhou Spell Bubble" and "Gensokyo Holoism."

name: Seekers of Tokane
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through diverse landscapes, each brimming with wondrous creatures known as Nefties. These captivating beings are yours to collect, train, and trade as you navigate and battle your way through the universe of Aurory.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Yuuhei Satellite Music Pack
description:
Additional Music Pack Vol. 6 is an artist pack including featuring song arrangements by Yuuhei Satellite, the extremely popular circle celebrating their 10th anniversary this year!
This pack also includes 6 Challenge Stages, one to go with each song!

name: Road & Track Presents: The Need for Speed - Special Edition
description:
Road & Track Presents: The Need for Speed - Special Edition is a 1996 retail re-release of The Need for Speed for PC which includes several improvements over the original 1995 PC release.
It introduced support for Microsoft Windows 95, whilst capable of running on Microsoft DOS, and several improvements to its rendering engine as well as two additional tracks.

The complete soundtrack playing during races was also made available on the Special Edition. This feature was previously only in the PlayStation and Sega Saturn releases.

name: Sidestep Legends
description: Practise your sidestep skills as you dodge spells coming at you from all directions. Level up and choose from a variety of upgrades and new abilities to increase your chances of survival in this moba inspired rogue-lite. Unlock new characters and explore different skill combinations each round.

name: Parthian Strike
description: Decades after the war with the machines, mankind has fallen into underground shelters to escape nuclear radiation. However, they are destroyed one by one by machine soldiers walking on the ground. The people challenge their last battle with humanoid weapons that were once used in the Great War.

name: Mega Bloks: Diego's Build and Rescue
Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Youyoumu - Arrangements Pack
description: This new Music pack, "Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack" contains new arrangements of six popular Touhou Youyoumu songs and six challenge stages go to with each song.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Side Story Pack - Cirno Arc
description:
The first Side Story is "Side Story Pack Cirno Arc".
"Team Scarlet Devil Mansion Trial Cirno’s Flight Arc" reveals just how Cirno became a professional Spell Bubbler!

name: D.M. Dinwiddie, Physician-in-Training
description:
Developed by Health Media Lab with grants from the National Institutes of Health, D.M. DINWIDDIE, PHYSICIAN-IN-TRAINING teaches children to identify and treat 12 common medical conditions: burns, choking, insect bites and stings, bumps and bruises, cuts and bleeding, sunburn, sprains and broken bones, food poisoning, common cold, influenza, tonsillitis, and appendicitis. Kids play as D.M. Dinwiddie, a 12-year old girl or boy (player's choice) who is earning a Medical Arts Achievement Badge. Through a series of interactive adventures, D.M. finds injured characters in her virtual neighborhood, including her little brother who has an insect bite.

By looking at and talking with the injured characters, and then using a special MedLab (an onscreen database that serves as a reference and diagnostic guide) and her first-aid kit, D.M. is able to diagnose and treat the hurt people.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Side Story Pack - Yukari Arc
description:
Side Story Pack, vol. 3!
The title is, "The Education of Spell Bubble - Yukari's Counterattack"!

name: Dora the Explorer: Carnival 2 - Boardwalk Adventure
Dora the Explorer: Lost and Found Adventure
Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Eiyashou - Arrangements Pack
description: This new Music pack, "Touhou Eiyashou Arrangements Pack” contains new arrangements of six popular Touhou Eiyashou (Eternal Night) songs and six challenge stages go to with each song.

name: Time Tripper
description: Time Tripper is a WAD developed by Emma Essex. The game features a custom protagonist, Doomelph, who must defeat many of DOOM's monsters alongside new ones and traverse spacetime.

name: Otherside
description:
A Strange New World
We set out to build the Otherside with one thing in mind: the metaverse should be anything but boring.

The world should be dynamic, steeped in narrative, and your actions should hold consequence.

Step into the Otherside, where the normal rules do not apply.

Where you end up is up to chance. Where you go is up to you.

Otherside is a gamified, interoperable metaverse currently under development. The game blends mechanics from massively multiplayer online role playing games (MMORPGs) and web3-enabled virtual worlds.

name: Move or Die: Couch Party Edition
description:
Move or Die is an absurdly fast-paced, 4-player local party game where the mechanics change every 20 seconds. The very definition of a friendship-ruining game, Move or Die is easy to pick up but hard to put down.

This is an offline only version of Move or Die that was available only with Amazon Prime and was delisted on May 1st 2021.

name: That's Not How it Happened
description: Disaster! When the Turner family’s inn burns down, they must recount the events that took place leading up to its fiery end!

name: Fantasy Fighters: Historic Fighters
description: Historic Fighters is a turn-based game that allows you to play with a historically themed class of your choice in a fantasy battle setting.

name: Alien Xenoblaster
description: Arcade themed game with loads of content such as dumb ugly aliens, crude humor, comedic undertone and more.

name: Ginger: The Tooth Fairy
description: Help Ginger in her Tooth Fairy quest in this cute, educational and fun platformer for all ages. Cute graphics and catchy music, fun gameplay and hidden secrets will put a smile on your face.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Eurobeat Pack
description:
The brand new “Touhou Eurobeat Pack” contains
selected classics from popular Touhou Eurobeat tunes!

name: Vermillion Descent
description:
After falling for what seems like forever, Dictum combat android VERSION-1.413^^10+2 finds herself in a mysterious otherworld deep below, an endless chasm devoid of life and futures. Without memory of who she was, who she is, or where she's located, all she can remember is that HOME is ABOVE.

Explore a beautiful and melancholy hand-drawn world inspired by the art of Tsutomu Nihei's Blame! and Aposimz. With only your wits and a one-ton coilgun attached to your arm, you must navigate the lower layers of the Follicle, an immense superstructure that seems to extend endlessly both in space and time.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Fujinroku Arrangements Pack
description: This “Touhou Fujinroku Arrangements Pack” contains brand new arrangements of six popular Touhou Fujinroku songs and six challenge stages go to with each song.

name: Lost at Sea
description: Maribel Hearn and Renko Usami go on a date to a supposedly haunted museum ship. This can, of course, only go well. A point-and-click adventure game made in Ren'Py.

name: Touhou: Heart of the Tiger
description: How does the highly revered Buddhist Monk Shou Toramaru spend her nights? ...By drinking at bars! Explore Shou's past and present as she helps different Touhou characters sort out their relationships in this visual novel (with minigames)!

name: Asu Kano! Asu mo Kanojo to Issho!
description: An erotic visual novel from PinballMap.

name: The Last Run: Dead Zombie Shooter
description: Stand up to fight massive hordes of zombies. Prepare your weapons, and fight against pure evil!

name: First Time In Paris: Collector's Edition
description: Join amateur travel blogger Kate Robinson and her daughter Nicole as they go on their first big business trip to save a Parisian hotel!

name: Hell of Sins: Soul
description: Hell of Sins: Soul is a Cthulhu-style horror adventure game (AVG). The story tells that Qin Xuan, the male leading role, fell into hell after his death, and found that hell was not the legendary reincarnation place of souls, but a horrible prison with various kinds of evil ghosts--Hell of Sins.

name: Poker Pop!
description:
A new way to play solo games of poker!
Poker Pop is a domino style tile matching game where you place cards onto the board to create poker hands. Score as many points as you can before filling up the board.

name: The Jumping Burger: Turbo
description:
Join BIG B on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Collaborations Pack
description:
This “Touhou Collaborations Pack” contains collaborations between popular Touhou acts!
Enjoy the musical mixes that they've created!

name: National Geographic Lilly Wu and the Terra Cotta Mystery
The Walking Dead: Last Mile
description:
The Walking Dead: Last Mile is perpetually accessible on Facebook as a clickable game that depicts the state of two groups of human survivors in zombie-plagued Alaska.

Users create a human survivor to survey the region, then select points of interest to trigger simple games involving shooting zombies, fixing power generators and more.
Performing well in those games earns players points that can be used to vote for narrative decisions about the fate of the survivor.

Its creators at GenVid call it a MILE, or Massively Interactive Live Event, and pitch it as part of the future of entertainment.

name: Nascar Web Racing
description: Nascar Web Racing the only free NASCAR-licensed racing game on the Web. Produced by Electronic Arts online division, EA Sports Nascar Web Racing allows players to choose real NASCAR Nextel Cup Series drivers, such as Dale Earnhardt, Jr. and Jimmie Johnson; official stock cars; real NASCAR tracks (Bristol Motor Speedway, Atlanta Motor Speedway, Infineon Raceway); and real NASCAR elements, such as drafting, passing and pit stops.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Akatsuki Records Song Pack
description:
Introducing "Akatsuki Records Song Pack!"
This is an Akatsuki Records-arranged collection of Stack-san's popular vocals.
For the first time with Akatsuki Records, Touhou Kouryudou's arrangements will be Touhou Spell Bubble all-new exclusives!

name: Ms. Pac Person
description: Ms. Pac Person is a clone of Pac Man (or Ms. Pac Man to be more specific). Graphics aside, the game is essentially identical to the original Pac Man. Ms. MacPerson (who is controlled with the keyboard) has to make her way through a maze, collect all the pills while staying away from the four ghosts that chases her. By eating special power pill things are turned around and she can go after the ghosts who then run away. A level is completed once all pills have been collected. The player has three lives and when they are used up it's game over. Like in the arcade original there are intermissions between some of the levels.

name: Mr. and Mrs. Potato Head Go on Vacation
Silent Seeker
description: Silent Seeker is a "Hide & Seek" multiplayer game. Play in the clutches of the hunter to find the props hidden in the map! Or Play as a prop and hide from the hunter!

name: Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey: Circus Friends - Asian Elephants
Rescue Heroes: Molten Menace
description: Kaboom! A volcano erupted near the quiet town of Misty Peaks! Spring into action with the Rescue Heroes Team and help save the town! Race against a river of lava with Jake Justice, and soar above rooftops with Ariel Flyer in search of stranded people and pets. Use your quick wits and problem-solving skills to complete each rescue mission and save the day!

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Diao ye zong - Song Pack
description:
Popular for beautiful melodies and lyrics that tell a story, we've collected Diao ye zong's songs into the "Diao ye zong Song Pack"!
Indulge your Spell Bubbler soul with these sublime songs!

name: Dream Dancer
description: Dream Dancer puts you in front and center in a competition to determine if you're the next pop music icon. Every aspect of your pop performance is customizable, so create the total superstar package! Mix songs to create a top radio hit, design trendy outfits for your performances, choreograph unique dance moves, record your performance and share your music video with friends via local wireless connection.

name: Dream Day: Wedding
description:
A romantic seek-and-find adventure featuring beautiful graphics and unique puzzle games. Visit the florist, gown shop, bakery, and other shops to make Jenny's wedding day a dream! But be warned! The challenging Wedding Crisis levels are sure to throw you for a loop! Can you make Jenny's Dream Day Wedding happen?
12 levels.
9 mini-games.
Ever-changing gameplay.

name: Earth Command: The Future of Our World is in Your Hands
Exorcist II
description: Save the world from everlasting darkness in Exorcist 2, the next terrifying chapter in the saga of Garret Ghostfighter.

name: Lilly's
description:
A 2D game set in a fantasy town inspired by the 1700s France or Italy.

You play as Lilly, a young girl who is the owner of a butcher shop that sells very special types of meat. Every night Lilly goes out with the big butcher's knife to restock the shop, by murdering the citizens of the town.

Lilly has been left by herself and been through some gruesome events, she is trying to reach out to her mother. Writing letters to her, asking for help and support but also about what she is doing at night.

There are good and bad people in the town, like anywhere else. You need to keep a balance otherwise there will be consequences. You also need to be careful to not get arrested by the police, because what Lilly is doing is actually a crime.

name: A Day as a T-Rex
description:
You play as a T-Rex through a human's daily routine and in a human apartment, and you have different tasks to complete to win the game.
Examples: Making the bed, brushing teeth, showering, making breakfast, maybe T-rex is working from home and has to attend morning meetings, doing laundry, filling the dishwasher, etc. All tasks have to be solved in creative ways with minimum damage. Every task can be completed in perfection for 100%, but for example, the dishwasher, with every broken thing that is supposed to go into the washer, that percentage shrinks, and by 0%, the task fails.
The apartment is filled just as an apartment would be, and most of the stuff is intractable with physics.

The player has T-Rex limitations. Hand position will be at the player's chest and the T-Rex nose is in the way, limiting the player's view and reach. The T-rex tail can knock stuff around.
At the start of the game, the player is instructed into the proper position, and each time the player breaks position, the game pauses, or some other penalty is added.
The player wins the game by completing the whole day. The score is based on how well the player completed each task.

name: Tesla Legacy
description: Explore a secret facility and use the power of electricity to defeat all machines, a new VR combat experience waiting to challenge your skills.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Platinum Edition
description: With the Platinum Edition of Farming Simulator 22, you start your farming venture in one of four distinctive European and American environments to take on agriculture, forestry and animal husbandry. At your disposal: More than 500 authentic machines and tools by over 100 renowned agricultural manufacturers from all over the world.

name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Game of the Year Edition
Emo's Match Maker: The Game of Love
Reel Deal Casino: Valley of the Kings
Emily Archer: The Curse of King Tut's Tomb
Missing
description:
Receive actual e-mail from virtual characters and The Phoenix himself, use these email and other evidence as clues, to put together the pieces of the puzzle.
Visit all kinds of Websites within the game to collect information and solve the case.

name: Rio
description: From the makers of the hit ICE AGE series comes RIO, a 3D comedy adventure about taking a walk on the wild side. The game focuses on Blu, a rare domesticated bird who travels to the exotic land of Rio. With the help of his female counterpart, Jewel and a group of wise-cracking and smooth-talking city birds, Blu goes on the adventure of his life! Along the way Blu journeys through Rio, dodging soccer balls, collecting tropical fruits and soaring across the beach. He participates in carnivals with new friends and ultimately, forms a conga line and dances his way to first place at the carnival ceremony. While the main character is Blu, players will also have a chance to play as the other characters from the movie in this multiplayer party game!”

name: Minigolf Maniacs
description: Miniature golf is a crazy sport as it is, but Minigolf Maniacs takes the unpredictable nature of the popular pastime to new heights. There are still the standard windmill holes, castles, and the like, but the game really goes nuts by adding in touches like fire-breathing dragons, ill-willed flower patches, and dozens of hidden obstacles. Add to all of that the fact that there's a pack of mischief-making kids running around terrorizing the golfers, and you've got yourself one tense gaming experience. You choose between eight playable characters each of whom happens to be a representative of a species from the wild and make your way through 40 wacky holes. There are eight different game types to shake things up a bit, and four hidden boss characters to ensure that your game won't be easy. All of the graphics are 3D, and the game is packed with shortcuts, power-ups, and lots of other unexpected madness.

name: Cycle Breaker
description: Deflect bullets and take down invading robot minibosses with just your laser sword, in pursuit of the highest combo!

name: Ukraine War Stories
description: Ukraine War Stories is a set of visual novels about the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. Set in the early months of the war, it tells the stories of civilians trapped on Russian-occupied territory. All stories are based on real events and eyewitness accounts.

name: Elohim Eternal: Prologue
description: A FREE Prologue to Elohim Eternal: The Babel Code, a turn-based JRPG-inspired indie title inspired by Xenogears and Shin Megami Tensei. Play as Joshwa as he helps an ex-Judge let go of his past. Battle beasts with mechanical parts using elemental and divine magic.

name: Make a Good 24 Hour Mega Man Level
description:
Make a Good 24 Hour Mega Man Level (MaG24HMML, or just 24H) was a private contest held by a small group of people from the MaGMML community. Contestants were given 24 hours to create a level based around the contents of a virtual mystery box, filled with a random selection of 2 enemies and 2 gimmicks from the official Mega Man games. There was no guarantee that any of these assets would make sense or work well together, so it was up to the contestants to make the most of what they had been given.

Despite some rough edges owing to the time constraint, the levels are on par with anything you'd find in any other MaGMML game. However, the game itself is very short and extremely light on bonus features; there's no hub world to explore or extensive postgame content to delve into. 24H is less a traditional MaGMML and more a proof of concept for Make a Good 48 Hour Mega Man Level, so please set your expectations accordingly for maximum enjoyment.

24H has no story or cutscenes of any kind, but the game technically takes place at the same time as Episode Zero, with the premise being that Mega Man is testing the simulation technology used in MaGMML2.

name: Make a Good 48 Hour Mega Man Level
description:
After all the work he's been doing for so many years, Mega Man is finally taking a well-deserved vacation. The Light family has set sail on a luxury cruise ship, the SS Elroy! Unfortunately, it seems an up-and-coming group of ne'er-do-wells has set their sights on the same cruise. Before long, it's up to Mega Man to blast through the cruise's Simulation Fair in an effort to gather enough Energy Elements to save the day!

Make a Good 48 Hour Mega Man Level (MaG48HMML, or just 48H) was held to test and refine the Megamix Engine in preparation for MaGMML3. Participants had 48 hours to create a level using randomly selected enemies and gimmicks from across the entire Classic Mega Man series. Levels were evaluated and ranked by a panel of 4 judges, and an elaborate game was built around the results. Unlike the main MaGMMLs, participants were not allowed to program custom objects for their levels - but that doesn't mean this game isn't just as wacky and innovative as previous ones.

48H is a spiritual successor to Make a Good 24 Hour Mega Man Level that takes place between MaGMML2 and MaGMML3, but no previous MaGMML knowledge is necessary to enjoy the story.

name: Versus Tactics
description: Versus Tactics is a 1v1 turn-based competitive battle game inspired by the classic Final Fantasy Tactics. Manage your levels, characters and summon to outsmart and overpower your opponents. Become the battlefield's ultimate tactician!

name: KWRPG Buster!!
description: KWRPG Buster!! is the newest entry in the long-running KWRPG series. Run and gun your way through more than 8 colourful and exciting levels! Defeat the bosses to gain new powers and confront your evil doppelgänger!

name: Harpoon
description: Top Down Shooter, a game where the player will have to dive into the endless depths of the sea as a diver and face thousands of predatory marine life, shooting back at them, pumping their weapons and equipment, gaining points and passing more and more, setting new records!

name: Mirror Chains
description: Novel match-3 gameplay + all kinds of beautiful girl characters = this game, you are welcome to challenge~

name: Matamarcianos
description: Simple freeware doujin shooting game where you shoot enemy waves before the time runs out. Get hit once and it's game over.

name: Mega Man: Dr. Wily's Final Attack
description: "Mega Man: Dr. Wily's Final Attack" is a 8-bit style Mega Man fan-game. 8 new stages, bosses and weapons; a whole slew of new enemies and even a secret hidden stage if you think you can find it.

name: Dribble
description:
Dribble is a mobile game about a super ball bashing business bots to bits!

With revoluntary swipe-based controls, you can kiss on-screen buttons goodbye! Just swipe to toss the ball! It's that simple! Not to mention that you'll tackle crazy platforming challenges in bizarre and over-the-top worlds like a jungle where it rains paint or a castle made out of pillows!

name: Fantastic 4
description: The Fantastic Four game for the Game Boy Advance (GBA), released in 2005, is a port of the main console version and was developed to correspond with the film's release. It features an action-oriented gameplay format utilising an isometric perspective. Players control the four members of the Fantastic Four, each equipped with unique abilities, to progress through levels that are thematically based on the movie's plot. The game integrates combat, puzzle-solving, and exploration, allowing players to use the distinct powers of each character to overcome obstacles and enemies.

name: Mega Man Ram
description: A few months after Roboenza was cured, Sheep Man was back to his job working at a circuit board manufacturer. After routine checks, he found a mysterious computer program running on one of the terminals, and on contact with the monitor, a mysterious surge of energy transformed Sheep Man! Now, with his new powers, he wants to take over the world, and has recruited 6 Robot Masters to help! It's up to Mega Man to stop his plans!

name: Red Baron Squadron
description:
Red Ace Squadron is basically a standalone add-on for Master of the Skies: The Red Ace
(or Red Ace for short). It includes the following improvements: 2 new campaigns with 14 additional missions, power-up stations to repair your plane, two new planes and multiplayer over LAN, modem and internet.

name: Hiss
description: A twist on an old classic.

name: Star Wars: Rebel Assault - Special Edition
Rebel Runner: Operation - Digital Code
description:
The planet Ranax is under attack from the evil Maaron empire. The last Ranaxian soldier must find and use a digital code to shut down the empire's mind-controlling satellite.

Rebel Runner - Operation: Digital Code is an arcade game where the main character shoots fireballs from his hands at extraterrestrial enemies, while crossing pre-rendered 3D levels. The character is controlled by either the keyboard (default buttons: CTRL for fire and ALT for jumping) or joystick. Each stage starts with three lives and the game saves progress between levels.

name: A Shadow Over Freddy's
description:
A Shadow Over Freddy's is a short point & click exploration horror game created to showcase unique free-roam gameplay while keeping the spirit of Five Nights at Freddy's intact.

Playing as an individual trapped inside an abandoned Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, you must traverse the location while avoiding the creeping darkness that infests every corner of the building. Complete different objectives each night, uncover your lost memories and find a way out of the accursed restaurant.

Relive the horror of the first FNaF game, as you explore every nook and cranny of the dilapidated remains of the original location, but with a new twist on the formula that will scare even the veterans of the series.

With no doors, no cameras, or time on your side, will you survive one last time against the shadows of your past?

name: Landing Gear
description: In Landing Gear the player simulates control of aircraft much like its predecessor Top Landing. The controls require the player to use a joystick to control the plane to bank left, right, up or down as well as a lever to power the engine up or down. The game offers the Beginners' Class and Expert Class difficulties. The player takes control of a training biplane, but will get the opportunity to fly better and bigger aircraft through progression. The gameplay shows a realistic console of aircraft controls and a 3D landscape, in which the plane takes off, flies around and lands. The player must follow take off, flying and landing procedures to achieve as many points as possible, but can lose the game if an accident happens.

name: Le Mans 24
description:
Le Mans 24 (ル・マン 24) is a Sega Model 3 arcade game by Sega, based on the real life endurance race of the same name and licensed by its organisers, Automobile Club de l'Ouest. It is unrelated to Le Mans 24 Hours for the Sega Dreamcast.

Le Mans 24 is unique among Sega racing games in that the races occur in real-time, with 24 in-game hours equivalent to roughly 10 minutes. Players have a limited amount of time to complete the 24 hour race and can earn extra time by passing other cars or completing a lap of the track. Likewise, being passed by another car subtracts time from the timer. If the timer runs out, the race continues even if there are no players. The player can choose to insert another credit and continue where s/he left off. Up to 3 twin cabinets can be linked to allow 6 player competition.

Le Mans 24 is much more realistic than other racing games of its era, with periods of rain affecting how the cars handle, simulated tire wear, and a day/night cycle.

name: Mega Man: Day in the Limelight 2
description:
Mega Man: Day in the Limelight 2 is the second game in a fangame trilogy based on the 8-bit series of games, and created by Riverroad.

Story-wise, Mega Man has either disappeared or become unable to beat Dr. Wily, and it's up to past Robot Masters to save the day.

While the basics function much the same way as traditional Mega Man games, each character has different attributes, from movement to attack patterns and even special abilities!

The idea was novel enough to warrant further sequels, improving on the formula. MMDL2 in particular allows you to play as the conquered Robot Masters in subsequent stages, among other secrets.

name: Mega Man Christmas Carol Remix
description:
In this remake of the original Flash game, controls have been improved, boss AI redone and made both fairer and more difficult, and the entire things been rebuilt from scratch with the Christmas Carol 2 engine!

In addition there are achievements and 10 possible endings.

name: Mega Man Christmas Carol 2
description:
The sequel to the first game. The player fights against four brand new bosses: Tiny Tim (alongside Bob Cratchit), Scrooge, Want, and Ignorance. It starts in a teleport room, in an unknown place (most likely in Wily's fortress). After the player has defeated the Robot Masters, the final battle awaits.

One possible ending to see, but with different characters.

name: Oh Joes! (A Proto Man Adventure)
description: Oh Joes! (A Proto Man Adventure) is a short Mega Man fangame that sends Proto Man on a mission to reclaim his stolen Proto Shield from a fortress full of Joes. It's more of a puzzle and strategy game than it is a traditional Mega Man game—you can force your way through everything, but the challenges are specifically designed to get you to think before you act. The game is intended to be a solid challenge for experienced players, yet accessible to players of any skill level.

name: Quint's Revenge
description:
Quint's Revenge stars the titular Mega Man from the far future. The twist here, Dr. Light knew of Dr. Wily's trip through time to reprogram Mega Man. Now free from Wily's control, Mega Man, i.e Quint, sets out for revenge.

The game adheres closely to Mega Man 2 and 3 but moves at a much quicker pace. The whole game is built around Quint's seldom seen abilities, like Sonic Dash, ducking, and ledge grabbing. It's an interest twist of the tried-and-true NES formula. Though still in beta, the game spans fifteen stages (8 Robot Masters, an intro stage, 6 fortress stages).

name: Rockman ZX Prequel
description:
Rockman ZX Prequel – a fan-game set 200 years before the events of Rockman ZX – quickly become a favorite among Chinese-speaking Mega Man communities.

Unique to ZX Prequel, though, is a light/dark world system. In the light world, you'll occasionally run into virus-infected mechaniloids. However, in the dark world, ALL enemies will be infected. Light or dark, enemies infected with the virus are said to be stronger than the norm. A gauge at the top of the screen shows you just how bad the outbreak is in your current position.

name: SuperDanny Powered Up
description:
Take control of the craziest Mega Man fan alive as you take on Dr. Wily and Robot Masters from MegaMan 1 & 2 in this epic Classic series game. Get equipped with power-enhancing items, classic-character costumes, and Cross Fusions--the ability to change into the Robot Master himself and inherit both his weapon and attributes--as you overcome up to 20 levels in various difficulty modes and conquer the 18 Challenges.

SuperDanny Powered Up is a loving fan tribute to Classic Mega Man that delivers content from the original NES games remixed in cool and unique ways, backed by a rock-solid engine widely praised for its precise accuracy with Capcom's.

name: The Real Deal: 10 Classic Card Games
Ready 2 Rumble Boxing
description: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing for Game Boy Color is the handheld adaptation of the 3D console game. It offers a selection of boxers and options of the original game, with simplified controls and 2D graphics.

name: Spellcraft
description: Spellcraft is a new type of strategy game: a Real-Time Battler where you actively command an entire team of heroes and cast spells to outplay your opponents.

name: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing: Round 2
description: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing: Round 2 is a boxing game port for the Game Boy Advance. It is also the sequel to Ready 2 Rumble Boxing.

name: Porkchop's Adventure
description: Porkchop's Adventure is an indie point-and-click fangame developed by Phisnom and composed by Nathan Hanover. It is a fangame of the Five Nights at Freddy's franchise based on the main concept of POPGOES Arcade 1 and 2. It's a teaser game of Porkchop's Horror Show.

name: FR3DD-Y2 p1223-R1a
description:
FR3DD-Y2 p1223-R1a is a visual novel FNaF x VA11 Hall-A fangame, created for the Fangames at Freddit's gamejam event.

You play as a potential new pizza-tender for Freddy's Pizzeria going through your first day on the job; getting used to the restaurant and its odd staff, cooking various types of pizza to serve to hungry customers, and having inane conversations with whoever sits in front of your station. The game takes the gameplay and style of VA11 Hall-A and mixes it with FNaF characters and pizza-making inside a Freddy's restaurant.

name: Idol Promotion: Yumie Suzuki
description:
Idol Promotion: Yumie Suzuki is a simulation game in which the player is the manager of young artists, at the beginning of the game he has to do the scouting for new idol (Yumie Suzuki) and the player's goal to make her becomes famous nationwide (to gain at least 10,000 fans within 1 year).

The game features a bonus second disc that contains Yumie Island, a big collection of clips, movies, photographs of Yumie, making of the game, etc.

name: Steven's Game
description: This is a small side game to Porkchop's Horror Show and will tell the story of Wonderland Toys, where Steven, Dorothy, Robbie, Terry, and Friend come from.

name: Another FNaF Fangame: Open Source
description: Another FNAF Fangame: Open Source is a moddable, infinitely changeable version of FNAF 2. It can be anything you want it to be, so make it the most enjoyable horror you have ever imagined. It's a FNAF 2 with newer mechanics, new office and different settings!

name: Sweep Serf
description:
Sweep Serf is a 2D puzzle platformer where players must use their wit navigate through minesweeper-like obstacles and get the highest scores.

However, players have more at their disposal than just their smarts to make it through. There are lots of items to unearth and craft to solve even the toughest roadblocks - and since each run is randomly generated, you can be sure that each playthrough is a fun and unique experience!

name: Pogo Bunny
description: Russian action-puzzle game where the player controls a bouncing rabbit through a series of stages, hopping between tiles.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Resurgence
description: The Division Resurgence is a free-to-play third-person shooter RPG that features a whole new and independent campaign from Tom Clancy’s The Division and Tom Clancy’s The Division 2, offering a new perspective on key story events. It takes place in a contemporary post-crisis America where a virus outbreak has created chaos and the collapse of the government. As an agent of the "Strategic Homeland Division” your mission is to restore peace, to protect civilians against hostile factions, and to help them build a better future.​

name: Mulk & Swank: Great Adventure in Magic World
description: A rare South Korean platform game based on the national animated series of the same name; clearly aimed at a children's audience.

name: White Heart Baekgu
description: First in a trilogy of South Korean platformers based on the animated film Hayan Maeum Baekgu, itself based on the 1993 news story surrounding the dog which travelled over 260km in six months to reunite with its previous owner. Received official localisation in the CIS and France.

name: White Heart Baekgu's Second Story
description: Second in a trilogy of South Korean platformers based on the animated film Hayan Maeum Baekgu, itself based on the 1993 news story surrounding the dog which travelled over 260km in six months to reunite with its previous owner. The game is more faithful to both source materials than the previous title.

name: White Heart Baekgu 3
description: Third in a trilogy of South Korean platformers based on the animated film Hayan Maeum Baekgu, itself based on the 1993 news story surrounding the dog which travelled over 260km in six months to reunite with its previous owner. This entry has almost nothing to do with the previous titles, and received official localisation in the CIS under the name "Rex 2." Also includes an electronic pet application.

name: The Dog Master
description: Japanese quiz game about dogs. Based on the Japanese franchise 'The Dog' created by Artlist in 2000. Questions range from breeds, behaviour, health issues, and physiology. Two puzzle games are also included. Over 2,000 questions, as well as a database of dog breeds with pictures.

name: MacPlaymate
description: Early interactive erotica program developed using MacroMind VideoWorks, featuring a pixellated woman named 'Maxie' and a selection of sex toys which can be used on her. One of the first games to include a 'panic button,' hiding the game behind a fake spreadsheet.

name: Those Nights at Fredbear's
description: Those Nights At Fredbear's was a free roam survival horror video game developed by Nikson. The game was cancelled, but way later on the 17th of July 2018, Nikson revealed a teaser trailer for a "Those Nights At Fredbear's" remake at the end of his anniversary Q&A video on The Joy of Creation: Story Mode.

name: Unreal Shift At Freddy's
description:
Unreal Shift at Freddy's is a game inspired by the popular franchise Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon.

It features a fully remade map from FNAF 1 in 3D and gives you the ability to free roam however you wish.

name: The Joy of Creation
description:
This is a FNaF fan-game, inspired by the fourth installment and by "The Boogeyman" video game.

Can you hear them calling out your name in the darkness?

Their own screams once gave you pleasure, but now they're gonna tear you apart- inch by inch.

You must use your sharp senses and abilities to defend yourself against your own creations lurking in your very own house.

But be careful, they're not as friendly as they are in the daytime; especially to you.

name: Those Nights at Rachel's 2
description:
That onslaught and terror which corrupted your very mind is only the beginning, those nightmares which tormented your brain is nothing like what we prepared.

Together we'll make your final moments something worth chanting for, something worth telling. And you- well you'll just be there to watch it all go down, sitting and staring without the ability to pick yourself up.

Tonight will be OUR night, the night in which we reign the same amount of screams and terror as we have in the past to find the one thing in which we really want

name: Last Crash
description: While performing missions in a world on the verge of destruction, we try to survive by managing resources under difficult conditions with special equipment.

name: Adventure Climb VR: Brave the Elements
description: This map pack adds five new levels to climb and explore all with varying difficulty to challenge even the most advanced climber!

name: Evil Bird Simulator
description: Evil Bird Simulator is a weird pixel art game where you control an evil bird that craps on people and cars. Some of the people will try to attack you and you will go to hell if you get a game over. You will have to play your way through hell to get back to the normal game. Do you have what it takes?

name: Kung Fu Er San
description: Kung Fu Er San is an 2D retro pixel fighting game inspired by the old classics.

name: Dreambound
description: Mysterious deaths. Friends, both old and new. Dreams that are reality, and reality that is a dream. Will Noah be able to move forward and solve the mystery⁠—or will he give in to the demons of his past? A story-rich BL mystery visual novel.

name: Hybrid Harmony
description: A romantic comedy visual novel set in a modern fantasy world filled with mythical creatures and races! Shape your story through tons of meaningful choices, text characters and unlock wallpapers using an in-depth phone system, and learn about the world and it's lore with an expansive glossary!

name: The Joy of Creation: Reborn
description: The Joy of Creation: Reborn is a free-roam survival horror video game and the second installment of The Joy of Creation series, developed by Nikson.

name: The Joy of Creation: Halloween Edition
description: The Joy of Creation: Halloween Edition is a free-roam survival horror video game developed by Nikson. The game is created for Halloween, and the player's only enemy is Ignited Springtrap.

name: Those Nights at Rachel's 2: Reloaded
description:
Two years after the events of Those Nights at Rachel's, errors begin to manifest within the fabric of the system, causing sensory and auditory hallucinations for its most dedicated following. On a rush to prevent backlash from the general public, the administrators of the 'TNaR' project push forward to develop a backup operation to their virtual-survival experience, designed with a new stable structure to permanently maintain hegemony whilist appealing to a new wider demographic.

Your job? Make sure everything works according to plan for the release of the new project. Welcome to the New Doug and Rachel's faithful beta tester! We hope you enjoy your stay; because this is the last one you're ever going to get.

name: Those Nights at Fredbear's: Reboot
description: hose Nights at Fredbear's Reboot is a discontinued official remake of the very first cancelled free-roam FNaF fan-game Nikson made. The remake features new story, new graphics, new characters etc. If you are going to use anything on this page for refrence in your fangame. Please credit the page and those who have contributed to it.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Cleaning Simulator
description: Five Nights at Freddy's Cleaning Simulator is a cancelled free-roam Five Nights at Freddy's fan-game made by Nikson for Fangames at Freddit's game jam.

name: Random House Puzzles & Games: Crosswords & Crostics
description: Random House Puzzles & Games: Crosswords is a compilation that consists of two separate games each containing one hundred and fifty puzzles.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season One: Shadow Tide
description:
Despite the SHD agent’s best efforts, a cell of rogue agents has been activated. Intel suggests that this cell is mobilizing and planning an attack in D.C.
Your first target, Neptune becomes available to hunt down today. We believe he sabotaged base infrastructure, killing several members of the JTF. Good luck out there, Agents!

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season Two: Keener’s Legacy
description: The Division tracks down a new rogue agent cell determined to pick up where Keener left off. Take down these all new targets, participate in new Leagues, Global Events, and more. And of course, earn all-new gear, weapons, and a new skill variant.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season Three: Concealed Agenda
description: An all-new Season starts today in The Division 2! Season 3: Concealed Agenda introduces new targets to hunt, new Leagues, new Global Events, and more.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season Four: End of Watch
description: Prepare for one of the biggest targets the Division has faced yet. In Season Four of Warlords of New York, Agents will chase down an old friend – do you have what it takes to bring them to justice?

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season Nine: Hidden Alliance
description: Agents take on Captain Lewis of the True Sons and his lieutenants: Castillo, Daniels, Chang and Xander.

name: Hidden Shapes Animals: VR
description: Tired after a hard day at work? Now, with the help of VR, you will delve deep into an environment exclusively prepared for you to have fun and rescue your tranquility, surprising yourself with each solved puzzle!

name: Isles
description: Isles is a 3D pixel world building simulation game: place tiles, manage resources and elect the leader regularly to thrive the island and build an army to fight against the invading troops. Also, many unknown islands are waited for your landing. Come and be the lord of the ISLES.

name: Galaxy Frontier
description: A shoot-em-up for Windows by Hello World Project.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Chireiden - Arrangements Pack
Touhou Spell Bubble: TamaOnSen - Song Pack
description:
A masterful mixer who needs no introduction, TamaOnSen's original pack has arrived!
In addition to super-popular hits like "Uki Yomichi (feat. Ranko, Uten-Kekkoh)" and "Monosugoi Vibes de MARISA ga Monosugoi Rap (MASPA!! Remix)," Sanae Kochiya's VA Kanae Itoh sings the vocals on an original song.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Eurobeat Pack Vol.2
description: The Touhou Eurobeat Pack was so popular last time, we've released a Volume 2! Enjoy a collection of Euro remixes that hold their own against Vol. 1!

name: SquishCraft
description: Squish blocks together to solve challenging puzzles.

name: Flower Girl 2
description: Flower Girl 2 is a game of beautiful girl + elimination + plot combination. The story is the story of players stealing sacred objects and fleeing the flower demon country with the tears of the flower god.

name: Idle Maku
description: Battle and survive through endless swarms of monsters! Idle Maku is a casual survival game where you power-up your character with weapons and upgrades to defeat increasingly stronger enemies that await you!

name: Polar Tubing
description: Put on those polarized shades and paddle out! It's time to go tubing with Polar Bear and his cool friends in exotic locations like the fjords of Iceland and the Amazon. Catapult your character from the waterslide into an exciting course full of obstacles and other fun surprises. You're on a mission to win medals by collecting stars and treasure chests! Use rapids to gain speed and get ahead of opponents. Be sure to avoid dangerous whirlpools - you don't want to get caught in a tail spin! Characters on the shore may try to distract you and slow you down. Fire the water cannons at them to uncover prizes! Can you cross the finish line with the best time or score?

name: Sakura Fantasy
description: Become a cute fantasy knight in a magical kingdom of beautiful women

name: Poker Superstars III: Gold Chip Challenge
Poker Pop
description: Poker Pop is a tile matching puzzle game with elements of Mahjong, Solitaire and Poker. 50 levels are included, each level is a city. By getting special combinations like full house or straight flush, you get power ups to discover the city, together with facts and trivia.

name: Pocket GT Racing
description:
Pocket Racing: the definitive racing game for the Gameboy Color.
Super smooth real time 3D racing on 32 courses stretching across 4 areas will have you entertained for hours!
32 cars to customise as you progress. You can even change the colour of your car!
3 modes of gameplay: GT, Time Attach and 2 player link up.
Maximum gameplay value as each car reacts differently. Fine tuning your car alters the handling capabilities even more.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Liz Triangle Song Pack
description:
To celebrate ten million views, we've included the hit track,
"Who Killed U.N.Owen," uncut and changed-up in tempo!
We've also included an all-original Touhou Gouyoku Ibun
arrangement of the tune, "Yok"!

name: Plaza Sesamo Erase una vez un Monstruo
Playtoons: The Secret of the Castle
Playtoons:The Case of the Counterfeit Collaborator
Playtoons Featuring Uncle Archibald
description: Playtoons 1 - Uncle Archibald is one of a series of educational games which allow players to interact with a story, or create a story with the construction kit and the characters, backgrounds, and scenery from this game or from the other games in the series. This game features a cartoon character named Uncle Archibald.

name: Rolie Polie Olie: The Search for Spot
Playboy: The Mansion - Gold Edition
description: Playboy: The Mansion - Gold Edition is a combination of simulation and management gameplay. Players take on the role of Hugh Hefner, tasked with running the Playboy empire. This involves managing the mansion, hosting parties, hiring staff, building relationships with celebrities, and expanding the magazine's brand through strategic decisions. The Gold Edition includes the base game and the Private Party expansion, which adds additional events, customization options, and gameplay scenarios.

name: Triple Triad: Tournament of the Elements
description: Triple Triad: Tournament of the Elements is a fantasy card game with Four mini-games to help players earn gil quickly and six card tournaments to enter. With thirty characters to choose from, one hundred and sixty trivia questions to answer and three hundred and sixty cards to collect you'll have countless hours of card gaming action!

name: Purr Pals Purrfection
description: Purr Pals Purrfection is a purrrfectly adorable Nintendo 3DS game that has you interacting with all the cute frisky playful kittens you've ever wanted! Choose a cuddly virtual kitten to adopt raise groom pet feed entertain and love! You'll have hours of fluffy fun choosing your kitten's breed toys and the accessories it will wear while you play. Share Meow Grams of cute and funny kitten pics with your friends. If you like kittens you'll love Purr Pals Purrfection. 10 mini-games have 3 levels of achievement in each game. Unique kitten personalities with different breeds that exhibit different behavior. Earn "Purrs" by keeping your kitten happy and frisky by engaging in playful activities and be rewarded with unlockables and achievements.

name: Purrfect Pet Shop
description: You're in charge of an animal adoption center. Care for strays as they arrive and use matching traits to give each animal a new home with the perfect owner.

name: Steve RPG
description: Steve RPG is an unofficial RPG where you play as Minecraft Steve on a mission to destroy villages. One day, Steve encounters a villager named Purble Drank - his drank is also purble - and takes a swig of his drank. Unfortunately, due to... methods, the drank was unstable. Steve wakes up to finding his most prized possession, an unnamed sword made out of an unnamed material, gone to the wind. This sparks Steve to destroy villagers and their villages. You gain several allies to rampage through several villages, becoming unstoppable.

name: P.J. Pride Pet Detective, Destination: Europe
Pitfall: The Lost Expedition
description:
Twenty-two years after making his groundbreaking debut on the Atari 2600, Activision's Pitfall Harry returns for more jungle-exploring action. The intrepid adventurer is brought to life for more than 50 perilous levels set in such exotic South American locales as rainforests, glaciers, mines, and ancient ruins. As in the original, players must utilize Harry's athletic prowess to swing from vines, run from rolling logs, hop over treacherous pits, avoid snapping crocodiles, and more, while trying to survive the hostile environment.

His objectives? To retrieve lost artifacts before they fall into the hands of his rival and to save those in danger. Pitfall Harry will eventually encounter situations that even he can't conquer with a well-timed jump or two, so players can pull items stored in his knapsack to assist him. Like the character's single foray on the original PlayStation, this game is designed to make players smile while exploring the mysterious lands before them. Although Pitfall 3D made use of Bruce Campbell's voice for its comic effect, Pitfall Harry attempts to use its visuals to elicit grins, with the protagonist drawn as a caricature, with a large head balanced atop a slender body.

As the story begins, Harry is a member of a treasure-hunting expedition whose plane goes down in the forest. The other survivors are scattered throughout the game; an older, wiser adventurer who was on the plane -- and who becomes incapacitated during the accident -- urges Harry to embark on a quest to save them while battling a rival, eco-unfriendly group of treasure hunters for the relics of the jungle so they can be returned to their rightful owners. He hands Harry the "Hero's Handbook" and Harry's off to adventure. The "Hero's Handbook's" pages are scattered throughout the levels just like the crash survivors are. Find new pages, and Harry will learn new moves.

name: Bebder Game: Bebder Than the Rest
description: The number 1 Anti-Wendy's RPG game in the world. Bebder was a robot who had always enjoyed eating at fast food restaurants. However, one day he decided to try Wendy's for the first time and he absolutely hated it. The food was gross and the service was terrible. Bebder was so angry that he killed the employee who served him. Now Bebder has a vendetta against Wendy's. He wants to kill the CEO of Wendy's in order to get revenge for the terrible experience he had at the restaurant. Bebder is a cold-blooded killer and he will stop at nothing until his mission is complete.

name: VR Robinhood Archery
description: "VR Robinhood archery" is a VR game of tower defense simulation archery

name: Icosi-Do
description: Your superpower is your patience. Nurture it with this single-player minimalist puzzle based on pure logic: swap pairs of colored rods such that all four rods that meet in any of 30 corners have different colors. Thousands of problems await you: from trivial to superhuman difficult.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Looney Tunes
description: This time the competition gets really animated! The most beloved Looney Tunes heroes hit the track! And that's not all, folks! Have fun with a new environment, the ACME Rockets module and custom elements for your Basement and Unleashed profile!

name: Lost Secrets: Bermuda Triangle - Unsolved Mysteries
Lost Secrets: Caribbean Explorer - Secrets of the Sea
Hidden Mysteries: Lost Secrets - A Vampires Tale, Paris Stories
Out of the Park Baseball 11: Championship Edition
Light Rangers: Mending the Maniac Madness
NOMBZ: Night of a Million Billion Zombies
Fussball Manager Bundesliga 2001
description: Fussball Manager Bundesliga 2001 is a football coaching game developed by electronic arts and themed around the German Bundesliga.

name: Quake
description: Quake is a first-person shooter video game, developed by id Software and published by GT Interactive in 1996 and featured music composed by Trent Reznor and Nine Inch Nails. It is the first game in the popular Quake series. In the game, players must find their way through various maze-like, medieval environments while battling a variety of monsters using a wide array of weapons.

name: Ninza
description:
Ninza is a multiplayer fighting game like no other! Instead of directly attacking your opponents, you crush them by pushing pieces of the level. Embrace chaos and dive into an entirely new level of frenzied and creative gameplay, where the environment itself becomes both your weapon and your ennemy.

Each character has a unique moveset and abilities, guaranteeing unexpected outcomes and thrilling comebacks in every battle. The game offers ample room for crafting creative strategies, tricks, and traps. But be warned, becoming a true Ninza master demands great determination. Only the boldest players can rise through the fierce competition and aspire to earn Mo0n's respect.

name: Fiction Fixers: The Curse of Oz & Adventures in Wonderland
Toybox
description:
Toybox is kinda like rubbing your head and patting your tummy at the same time.

Shoot enemy toys on the left side of the screen to earn wooden blocks on the right. Then stack the blocks to explode stuff, power up your ship and earn extra lives. Each side affects the other, so master the interaction and survive as long as you can to get a high score.

name: FIFA Soccer 96
description: Game Boy port of FIFA Soccer 96.

name: FIFA Soccer 2003
description: FIFA Soccer 2003 for Game Boy Advance brings the excitement of world-class soccer to handheld gaming. Featuring authentic teams, players, and stadiums, the game offers a realistic and immersive experience. Players can engage in various modes, including Season, Tournament, and Quick Match, allowing for both quick play sessions and extended gameplay. Enhanced graphics and smooth controls ensure an enjoyable and competitive soccer simulation. With its dynamic gameplay and comprehensive features, FIFA Soccer 2003 on GBA delivers a thrilling soccer experience for fans on the go.

name: Sundermead
description:
Sundermead is a procedurally generated, open-world RPG in which the Anglo-Saxon gods have sent you to the Island of "Sundermead" to create a settlement. The gods have tasked you with farming and, over time, inviting more people to join you in your settlement. It takes inspiration from the two popular games, Minecraft and Stardew Valley.

Each new villager you invite to your settlement will bring something new, allowing you to unlock more items, trade with the outside world and form relationships!

But there is more to Sundermead than just your newly founded settlement. Below the ground lurks creatures beyond your imagination.

name: Final Conflict
description: You're about to engage in galactic war like there's no tomorrow. Fail and there won't be one. It's just you against the Donanji Marauders, the most lethal aliens in the universe. But if you take them on too soon, you can kiss your little Alliance good-bye. Better get your ships together. You've got planets, moons, space stations and bad manners to conquer. Crucial resources are spread over 21 uniquely designed missions. The good news is you decide your own path.

name: Fishing
description: 30 unique lakes. Amazing graphics! Beware of the lake monster You got a bite!

name: Kangaroo Court
description: Kangaroo Court is a 1991 HyperCard game by Dave and P.F. Dumanis. Having been charged with an unknown, often absurd crime, you are forced to bargain for their innocence from a sadistic kangaroo judge who takes every opportunity to belittle and harass them. Players can take any number of strategies against the Kangaroo, including bribery, sucking up, and confrontation. They all invariably result in failure or death. The goal of Kangaroo Court isn't victory so much as seeing how long you can go against increasingly unfair and randomized odds.

name: Volcano! Mount Saint Helens
description:
Mount Saint Helens Review Program and Survival Simulation for MS-DOS

Developed by Meed Software using IBM LinkWay and distributed as "Volcano!" by Home Learning Software

name: Fuksoft
description:
Slovak text adventure game, likely the first Czechoslovak homebrew title to feature autobiographical elements within the game's narrative. Title and characters are an homage to Fuxoft. Takes place in a Czechoslovak apartment building, with gameplay based on map navigation and puzzle-solving against a time limit, controlled by keyboard shortcuts rather than typed-in commands.

Received an English translation in 2021 as part of an initiative by the Slovak Game Developers Association in cooperation with Slovak Design Museum, with funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

name: Fuksoft II
description: Fan sequel to Sybilasoft's Fuksoft from 1987.

name: Worldsmith
description:
Worldsmith is an exciting, immersive text game. Type in commands and explore the World, solve puzzles, talk to people and play the Game of Worlds. In Worldsmith, you control the story.

With over 150,000 words of text, Worldsmith is a full, novel length, Interactive Fable.

As you explore the world of the Septem Tower, you will create solar systems and Life, unearth ancient mysteries, and discover the secrets behind the Tower and its billion year mission.

Worldsmith is an Interactive Fable and is part novel, part adventure, part puzzle and part strategy game.

name: La Dame de Monsoreau
description:
Slovak text adventure game based on the 1846 historical novel by Alexandre Dumas.

Received an English translation in 2021 as part of an initiative by the Slovak Game Developers Association in cooperation with Slovak Design Museum, with funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Rhythm Game Song Pack
description: Containing hits like "Usatei" by Cool&Create and "Machibito Ha Kozu." by Butaotome, the "Rhythm Game Song Pack" has you covered with all your favorites from rhythm games.

name: Perfect Murder
description:
Slovak murder simulator text adventure game in which the player can kill a person of their choosing (by entering their name) and then cover up the tracks. One can explicitly choose to murder an "unpopular politician."

Received an English translation in 2021 as part of an initiative by the Slovak Game Developers Association in cooperation with Slovak Design Museum, with funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

name: Pepsi Cola
description:
Slovak text adventure game wherein the player tries to break into a house to steal a secret recipe for Pepsi Cola. Music is taken from Trantor: The Last Stormtrooper.

Received an English translation in 2021 as part of an initiative by the Slovak Game Developers Association in cooperation with Slovak Design Museum, with funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

name: Super Discus
description:
Surreal Slovak text adventure game taking place in an insane asylum co-inhabited by fictionalized versions of Sybilasoft themselves.

Received an English translation in 2021 as part of an initiative by the Slovak Game Developers Association in cooperation with Slovak Design Museum, with funding by the Slovak Arts Council.

name: Halloween Night
description: HyperCard point and click game where you open the door to Halloween costumed monsters and give them candy.

name: Halloween Night II
description: Halloween Night II is a 1989-1991 children's game by BugByte Inc. for Macintosh. On Halloween night, monsters knock at your door looking for candy. You hand them candy, cheer them up, and wait for the next monster to come by. While you're waiting, you can pet your cat or look out the window.

name: Carton-Kun
description: Carton-kun is a puzzle game that features a kind of Carton family that compete in different puzzle modes. The game features 3 game modes and 6 different character at the beginning (each of them with his own special attack) and other hidden characters that will be unlocked solving other parts of the game.

name: Kanako Enomoto Junk Brain Diagnosis
description:
Kanako Enomoto Junk Brain Diagnosis is a collection of wacky mini games that allows one player mode or group mode (with up to 8 human players using the multitap controller).

The goal of the game is to pass the different diagnosis to determinate if you're sane or not...

name: Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks
description: Lost in the cursed mountains of Gravehollow Peaks, two rival assassins must set their differences aside and find a way home... unless something finds them first. A story-rich fantasy with magic, romance, and choices that matter.

name: Flux Family Secrets: The Rabbit Hole
Westurn
description:
Westurn: Turn Based Showdowns is a turn based Western (Westurn?) full of high stakes cowboy duels, mind games, and tactical thinking!

Block bullets and shoot bandits when they're off their guard, all while hastily reloading your own gun before they catch you off of yours. Use your sharp mind and sharp shooting to figure out your foe's tactics and use it against them!

Streamers can even invite their own audience members to a duel in 1v1 PvP Showdowns to settle whose the sharpest shooter once and for all!

In PvE, players take the role of the Shadeless Sheriff - travelling across the Endless Wasteland while outsmarting outlaws and hunting down their notorious Gang leaders. Each with their own unique territory, weapons, and dueling style.

name: Fly Logic: Fly Fishing - The Green River
Gunstars
description:
A multiplayer Battle Royale made for mobile!

Gunstars is a fast-paced third-person shooter battle royale, where the player’s main objective is to explore the combat arenas to collect supplies and weapons to fight and be the last one standing.

Fight, explore and create the best strategy to survive epic battles with up to 36 players. Play solo or invite friends and live epic experiences within the battle arenas of the Gunstars universe.

Join competitive teams for exclusive rewards, and collect or trade NFTs with the community, all close to your favorite creators and brands.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Scarlet Devil Land Arrange Song Pack Vol.2
description:
"Scarlet Devil Land Arrange Pack Vol.2”, a collection of popular arrangement tracks is here.
Featuring classics like “sweet little sister” and the much talked about “Scarlet Police on Ghetto Patrol 24PM”, this pack is filled with songs just as popular as those included in Phase 1.

name: Yet Another Fantasy Title
description: Become a rogue in an open-world fantasy RPG, filled with absurd humor and bard music. Go on an epic quest to kill the dragon. Kill filthy orcs, deal with arrogant elves, drink with dwarves, learn spells from hobo-wizards and steal the ring from goblins. All packed in an old-school gameplay style.

name: Baba is You Xtreme
description: Baba is back in this short freeware puzzle game! Revisit familiar mechanics and experience some wacky new surprises! Are you Hardcore enough to complete all the levels??

name: Dark Lord's Maze
description:
DARK LORD'S MAZE is a 3D dungeon crawler made in 8-bit style.

Jump right into this colorful, pixelated world full of traps, enemies and different environmental hazards and enjoy a true classic gaming experience, fueled by the sounds of Commodore 64's SID and a fair amount of difficulty!

name: Haunted Vlogs
description: Two teenagers, a vlogger and her cameraman, go to explore an abandoned college, searching for clues and, eventually, an exit. There is a small tension between them. Will they tell their feelings before it's too late?

name: Cheese Runner
description: Trade illicit cheese in a dystopian cyberpunk city filled with police killbots trying to hunt you down in this ASCII Art text-based early 80s retro trading game. Like a fine blue cheese, this isn't for everyone.

name: The Tsar's Secret
description: An indie stealth game about outsmarting your enemies by altering the senses. Would you rather blind or deafen your enemies?

name: Metapilot
description: Designed with top experts from Boeing, the UK Government and several EVTOL companies, Metapilot gives you the real EVTOL flight experience! Fly your aircraft around the city, pick up guests from skyscrapers on time and don't run out of fuel! Bring the future one step closer by playing Metapilot now.

name: Love Talks
description: This is a dating sim where you explore the school to find conversation topics and talk to the heroine. The goal of the game is to ask the heroine to the school festival within 7 days.

name: Liar Moon Shangri-La
description: A sad tale of lies and understanding. Even if it's your lie, I'm willing to accept it. As a romance visual novel game, this work uses the labels 'lie', 'moon' and 'tale of woe' throughout the main story. The love story between the heroine and the charming but sinful heroes is depicted.

name: Dead District: Survival
description: Dead District is a multiplayer and single-player survival sandbox game in an open world where the player has a wide range of options.

name: TVs: The Illusion Channel
description: What happens when a TV wakes up and finds himself in an illusional world, where the facts become a crazy dream, TVs is a platformer game combining intense action with challenging puzzles and fight the scary bosses.

name: Oppai Puzzle L
description: It's been a busy day. Now, relax your body and come this way. Let the elder sister come to comfort your body after a long day.

name: Neko Cosmo Police
description: This twin stick shooter is about Neko fighting with their all cost. In 2565 UC. the Cosmos has been altered by MadBotz gang. The last hope is rely on the Neko Cosmo Police team, "Kuro" and "Shiro"

name: Momo Mother Bird: Final Story
description: The doors are locked, no one answers and definitely won't help. Your task is to get out and not let yourself be caught! Solve puzzles, escape from the pursuit of Momo 2 and get out of this nightmare! This time Momo won't let you get bored!

name: Battle Part
description: 3D Vehicles Shooter focused on boss battles.

name: Lust Dungeon
description: Lust Dungeon is a lesbian roguelike deckbuilder game where you save your loved one from a deep dungeon full of dick monsters. Collect cards to build powerful decks and defeat your enemies before your loved one sees so many penises she forgets what true love was like!

name: Invadead
description: shoot at hordes of zombies using diffrent guns and grenades, epicly decimating them by your pure handsomeness.

name: Futa University
description: Futa University is a game about higher education in the way of futanari. You play as a futa student attending a university full of horny futa girls. You must navigate your way through classes, exams, and social activities while trying to keep your grades up and your cock satisfied.

name: Bob: A thousand lives
description: Discover Bob's variable and unique world, get to know his story and support him to reach his goal which is non other than finding his ultimate peace. Be a part of the cycle in which death and reborning are present countless times almost at the same time.

name: Controller Sync
description: Arcade multiplayer game Ideal for practicing controller skills

name: MetälBörn
description: Techno has taken over your neighborhood. Honor your metal god Kilmister, arm yourself up to the baffles, raise the volume and show these punks which is the music that makes the shells shake. The metalheads are not dead, but the technos will be…

name: Mondays: A Sisyphean Typing Game
description: An absurdist typing game where you write out randomly generated emails in an effort to reach the peak.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack Kogasa Tatara
description:
Introducing “Kogasa Tatara” the cheery forgotten umbrella!
She is an additional character with the ability to cover up the opponent’s area with her Karakasa Bubble.

name: Spineworld
description: Spineworld was an online multiplayer steampunk-styled browser game founded by Playdo AB in 2000. Users could visit and own apartments, explore, travel, chat, go on quests, and interact with game characters and other users.

name: Detective Conan: Kiganshima Hihou Densetsu
description: Legend of the Treasure of Strange Rock Island is a game for the Game Boy Color, and the second Game Boy Color game in the series. In this game, Conan, Ran, Kogoro, Sonoko, and the Detective Boys all visit an island where a murder as occurred.

name: The Happyhills Homicide
description:
Welcome to Happyhills, the place where you can indulge your deepest desires, make your wildest dreams come true, and slaughter anyone in any way you want. In this case, all three of these are the same.

Play as a stylish 80's style slasher and kill your way through different levels. Remember: professionals have standards, kill every target in an unique way and do not get caught, spoils the fun.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 77: The Suiei
description: Simple 1500 Series Vol.77: The Suiei is a swimming simulation game that features the classic 4 swimming styles (Freestyle swimming, Breaststroke, Backstroke. & Butterfly stroke), up to four players to compete at the same time, the gameplay controls is using the gamepad analog sticks.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 94: The Cameraman - Gekisha Boy Omakefu
Missile Command
description: Game Boy port of Missile Command, released alongside Asteroids.

name: Missile Command
description: Game Boy Color remaster of the Game Boy version of Missile Command.

name: Mind Medley
description: Mind Medley is a collection of casual mini-games for the PC designed to challenge memory and attentiveness.

name: Millionaire Manor, Robin's Quest, Escape the Lost Kingdom and the Hidden Object Show 2
Mike Tyson Boxing
description: Mike Tyson Boxing was developed by Virtucraft and published by Ubi Soft for Game Boy Advance in 2002.

name: Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits
description: An arcade game compilation released for Game Boy Advance.

name: Metropolis
description: Metropolis is a platformer with puzzle elements. Players navigate through screens, avoiding enemies to preserve energy. Collect items for later use, jump, and open doors. Control Moonboots the Lunar Explorer, stranded in Metropolis, on a mission to find and refuel his spaceship for a return to the moon. Moonboots can transform into companions with unique abilities by carrying specific objects. Access restricted areas and passages based on characters and objects.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Seirensen Arrangements Pack
description: This pack consists only of "Touhou Seirensen" arranged music!

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack Hata no Kokoro
description:
Introducing "Hata no Kokoro" the expressive pokerface!
Has the "Combo Morph: 3 Types" ability that gives you three types of Special Bubbles depending on the color of your fifth combo.
When the 5th combo is performed by a red/purple bubble, a "Flam Bubble" appears on the opponent's field.
Yellow/Green will grant you a "Thunderswipe Bubble", and Blue will grant you a Paint Bubble.
Also, the Spell Card is a distinctive character!

name: Knights of Decayden
description:
Knights of Decayden is a rediscovered (July 2022) title, a long-lost exclusive release for the original Xbox. It was developed by the team behind a series of acclaimed Star Wars games and quietly canceled by Microsoft two decades ago.

Knights of Decayden (sometimes spelled as Decadyn) has been largely unknown to the public until now and helps highlight a hidden part of early Xbox history.

The game went by many names, including Knights of Utu, when it was pitched in 2000 to Sony as a PlayStation 2 game. Ultimately it became an Xbox exclusive until it's cancellation.

name: MechWarrior 2: The Titanium Trilogy
description: The Titanium Trilogy is the re-release of all MechWarrior 2 games for Windows 95, rebalanced and fully textured.

name: Max on the Moon
description: Educational game published by Tivola Electronic Publishing in 1999, considered abandonware. The game has a hand-drawn artstyle.

name: Reality Mod
description:
A Battlefield 3 total conversion with focus on realism, teamwork, communication & combined arms. Immerse yourself in a tactical experience.

The Mod draws most of its inspiration from the successful BF2 "Project Reality" mod and offers a complete gameplay and UI overhaul that creates a more tactical and in-depth experience compared to the vanilla BF3.

name: Fuck Putin
description: In February 2022, Russia invaded Ukraine. This event shocked the whole world. Unjustified aggression must be condemned, and the president of Russia, Vladimir Putin - punished.

name: Math Missions: The Race to Spectacle City Arcade K-2
Math Missions: The Amazing Arcade Adventure Grades 3-5
Math Invaders
description: While passing the uncharted planet Metreon, the spaceship SS Pythagoras is attacked by hostile Geometroids who have taken the crew and ship hostage. The ship's security chief managed to avoid capture and now must fix the ship, free the crewmates, re-take control of SS Pythagoras and stop the Geometroids from taking over Earth.

name: Math-A-Thon 2: The Mystery of the Missing Laboratory
CTGP-7
description: CTGP-7 is a modpack for Mario Kart 7 which adds new things to the game, such as custom tracks and characters, extra features and more.

name: Pokémon Theta Emerald Renev
description: Pokémon Theta Emerald Renev is a remake of the difficulty/enhancement rom hack Pokémon Theta Emerald EX, expanding its selection of obtainable Pokémon and adding a number of quality of life changes.

name: Mary Kate and Ashley's Dance Party of the Century
The Silver Age
description:
This year you have been assigned to be the CEO of the Silver mine.
To start mining the bronze and become the biggest silver mine in the world.
Good Luck and Have Fun.

name: Miramagia
